title: Apple and blackberry cobbler
ingredients: ['700g cooking apples, peeled, cored and thinly sliced', '25g butter, melted', '4 tbsp caster sugar', '1 tbsp orange or apple juice', '225g blackberries', 'COBBLER TOPPING', '225g self-raising flour', '1/4 tsp ground cinnamon', 'a pinch of salt', '100g cool butter, diced', '50g caster sugar', '5 tbsp semi-skimmed milk', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 tbsp demerara sugar, for sprinkling', 'TO SERVE', 'cream or custard']
